import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Tooltip, Pie } from 'recharts'; import { format_to_gb } from '../../library/format' import '../../styles/Admin/db.css' export default function DB(props) { const [dbState, setDBState] = useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:4000/api/monitor/db").then(res => res.json()) .then(db => { //.filter(item=>"stocks" in Object.values(item)) db.collections.map(item=> { console.log("stocks" in Object.values(item)) return item.name }) setDBState(db) }) },[]) return (

aaronbaeDB

{dbState &&

Machine Memory Used (GB)

{dbState.collections && dbState.collections.map((item, index)=> )}
Collection Doc Count Memory (GB)
{item.name} {item.n} {format_to_gb(item.reserved, 4)}
{dbState.collections &&

Average History Count: {dbState.collections.filter(item=>"stocks" in Object.values(item))[0].average_count}

}
}
) }
